teal.ui.swing

Class JTaskPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • teal.ui.swing.JTaskPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class JTaskPane
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements javax.swing.Scrollable
    JTaskPane provides an elegant view to display a list of tasks ordered by groups. It can be added to a JScrollPane.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
